==Abilities and Attacks==
''Most attack names are unofficial.''
===Normal===
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1      = State Shift
|desc_1      = When hit by {{Electro}} or {{Pyro}} attacks, the Whirling Pyro Fungus will enter an Activated or Scorched state respectively, gaining enhanced attacks. A Whirling Pyro Fungus can only undergo state shift once.
* If the Whirling Pyro Fungus is defeated while Activated or Scorched, it may drop {{Item|Inactivated Fungal Nucleus}}, {{Item|Dormant Fungal Nucleus}}, and {{Item|Robust Fungal Nucleus}}, while the drop rates for {{Item|Fungal Spores}}, {{Item|Luminescent Pollen}}, and {{Item|Crystalline Cyst Dust}} will greatly reduce.

|name_2      = Explode
|desc_2      = Inserts itself into the ground and produces an explosion after charging, dealing '''60% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Pyro DMG}}.
* '''Activated:''' Speed increased, this attack will be chained 3 times in a row.
* '''Scorched:''' Speed reduced, AoE increased, DMG increased to '''100% ATK''', knockback increased.
|file_2      = Whirling Pyro Fungus Explode
|caption_2   = Normal
|file_2_2    = Whirling Pyro Fungus Explode 2
|caption_2_2 = Activated
|file_2_3    = Whirling Pyro Fungus Explode 3
|caption_2_3 = Scorched

|name_3      = Whirling Bump
|desc_3      = Rapidly spins before bumping into the player, dealing '''30% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
* '''Scorched:''' DMG increased to '''60% ATK''', knockback increased.
}}

==Descriptions==
{{Description|A spore organism of some intelligence. It possesses extreme adaptability.<br />Due to the abundant amount of Pyro these creatures contain, they have a tendency to cause forest fires during dry seasons, and thus are considered a dangerous invasive species to the forest.|[[Archive]]}}
